title: Be Careful Of What’s Coming Next (Ep 1777)
description:
Be very careful of what’s coming next. In this episode, I address the lies being perpetrated by the left to grotesquely take advantage of the tragedy in Uvalde. 

News Picks:


Beto O'Rourke disrupts Governor Abbott's press conference on school shooting, escorted out by police.

Beware of data about right-wing violence. 


Hunter Biden swiped personal info from his family's phones, laptop data suggest.


Politi”fact” humiliates itself AGAIN, with another hilariously stupid “fact-check.”


Fox reporter hits back hard at liberal hack. 


Good guy with a gun stories the media wants to ignore.


Biden tax increases would harm jobs and wages, study shows.
